Together we are as strong as a tree trunk which cannot be broken

We are completely honest. To colleagues, customers and our work

Stromy si sami vybíráme a opracováváme do poslední třísky. Hladké dřevo vonící lesem ručně lakujeme 100% ekologickými barvami a s úsměvem posíláme do vašich domovů. Specializujeme se na masivní nábytek, vybavení do dětského pokoje… a jiskry v dětských očích. Hlavně protože jsme sami rodiče.

More than 10 000 happy kids are falling asleep in their dreamed-of house beds
We have received more than 500 references that make us happy
We follow one philosophy and that is a family – both ours and yours.
All the advantages appreciated by our customers are to be found

Every family has its story. Live it with us

In 2015, the head of the whole Benlemi family, Michal Pomp, got an idea. He wanted to provide all families around the world with unique furniture made of natural materials.
In the same year, Michal introduced his first Benlemi products. These were hand-weaved ecological hanging chairs made of willow twigs which are popular up to now.
In the spring of 2016, our Michal has started to make children all over the Czech Republic happy. The reason is that he began with production of house beds made of solid wood.
In February 2017, Michal joined forces with his brother Petr. Since then, they managed to expand their business and set up central warehouse, painting shop and new offices.
Currently our family consists of more than 35 members and we all got chummy with each other. We are honest to each other and we are not afraid to make a fun of ourselves. However, when it comes to the job, we take it more than seriously.
As the Benlemi family, we have satisfied customers and faithful business partners in both the Czech Republic and the rest of the world. Therefore, families all over the Europe can get our design furniture.

Michal Pomp

CEO a CFO

This is the one who affectionately established Benlemi s.r.o. Fortunately! Now, as the head of the company, he sets the right direction to everything that’s going on.

Petr Pomp

COO, CIO a CSO

Petr sets the right rhythm to all operations. He knows about every splinter which falls off and he also checks the warehouse operations and customer support.

Honzovou supersílou je přesnost. Každý nový model nábytku konstruuje do posledního milimetru. Proto jsou naše produtky bezpečné a spolehlivé.
